title: Lotus Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A hidden gem at Zen Garden Market, Panama City Beach, Florida, with a mostly vegetarian menu in a serene garden setting. Beverages menu features smoothies, fresh juices, teas, tonics, exlirs, and coffee. Food menu features several small plates, breakfast, chips and salsa, falafel and pita, 2 sandwiches, and 2 hot plates. Non-veg items served are chicken and shrimp only.
